casebody.data:
2002-1711 (La. 10/14/02)

Sidney G. LASYONE v. Greg PHARES and the City of Baton Rouge. No. 2002-C-1711. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Phares, Greg et al.; Baton Rouge City of; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of E. Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court Div. H, No. 442,884; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 CA 1785.

Denied.

JOHNSON, J., would grant the writ.
